name: The King
description:
Game made for FC_Jam#2 for PICO-8 virtual console.

Idea and main characters made by 13yo Michal . The rest is mine (with Michal's assistance). Game made in less than 7 days. All levels are generated and unique.

Push your king to the target. Avoid mud and water. Rocks are higher than water. King loves beer.

Features: physics based movement (elastic collisions, gravity, friction), generated levels.
